description:
Ezaki Yuuichi is a seventeen-year-old high school student who is hospitalized for hepatitis A. He notices a beautiful girl, http://anidb.net/ch7971 [Rika], in the east wing of the hospital and is later encouraged by the nurse Akiko to befriend her. Within minutes Yuuichi enrages Rika by lying about having read her favorite book, but Rika offers to forgive Yuuichi if he were to obey her wishes. Eager to gain that forgiveness, he agrees. As they spend time together, Yuuichi begins to fall in love with Rika.
-Wikipedia-
name: Ezaki Yuuichi
